T02D2499:268b-18: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //

T02D2499:268b-28: mtshan ma dam pa rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang

T02D2499:268b-31: su spros ba sngar nye bar son pa de'i lag

T02D2499:269a-1: rig pa la sogs kyang ni rgyu ste gzhan gyi sems ni gcig tsam gsal ba ma yin nyid //
T02D2499:269a-2: brtan pa dang ni g-yo ba'i 'gro ba 'di kun rang gi sems las byung bar bsam par bya //

T02D2499:269a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che //

T02D2499:269a-9: mnyam nyid ye shes de bzhin nyid //
T02D2499:269a-10: byang chub sems zhes bya bar brjod //

T02D2499:269a-15: rang gi mtshan ma sa bon yi ge'i 'od kyis sbrul //
T02D2499:269a-16: brtse ldan sgrub po blo ni rab tu 'phel ched du //
T02D2499:269a-17: sku gzugs lus la rigs dang rjes mthun bu mo

T02D2499:269a-21: gsang sngags rig pas lag pa 'dzin pa bsgrub par bya //
T02D2499:269a-22: rigs lnga'i cha shas kyi lus mdzes pa la spyi
T02D2499:269a-23: bo dang snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang ba

T02D2499:269a-25: zhes pa'i sngags kyis de'i lus la spyi bor zla

T02D2499:269a-27: m'a: k'a ra pi k'a ra karnni ka pha lanta
T02D2499:269a-28: ba la / nytsa / las dang chos dang dam

T02D2499:269a-30: ba la / nytsa / par sbyangs te / yang

T02D2499:269a-33: dpal chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi lha mo
T02D2499:269a-34: sku gzugs dang gcig nyid du bya'o //
T02D2499:269a-35: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2499:269a-36: ye shes snang gsal 'od byed ma //
T02D2499:269a-37: lag pas lag pa bzung nas su //
T02D2499:269a-38: sangs rgyas phrin las rab tu sgyur //
T02D2499:269a-39: bden pa gang gis ye shes mchog / shes rab thabs bdag dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D2499:269a-40: bden pa de yis mgon khyod kyis //
T02D2499:269a-41: bdag gi 'dod pa yongs rdzogs mdzod //
T02D2499:269a-42: aom h'um hr'im badzr'am bha ba dri dha tishtha bhr'um
T02D2499:269b-0: kham h'um aom su pra @269b tishtha badzre sv'a h'a
T02D2499:269b-1: / ye dharm'a he tu pra bha b'a he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba bta /
T02D2499:269b-2: tesh'a nytsa yo ni ro dha ye bam b'a d'i
T02D2499:269b-3: ma h'a shra ma na: de ltar rab tu gnas
T02D2499:269b-4: pa byas nas / nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam ba nyid du rjes song rab gnas ni //
T02D2499:269b-5: de bzhin gshegs dang chos kyi glegs bam rdo rje dril bu rnams //
T02D2499:269b-6: de ltar dam pa'i don du min mod 'on kyang 'jig rten du //
T02D2499:269b-7: 'jig rten phan pa bzhed pa'i mgon bos rab tu gnas pa'ang mdzad //
T02D2499:269b-8: gang 'di sku gzugs rab gnas pa //
T02D2499:269b-9: sa dang chu dang me rlung las //
T02D2499:269b-10: bskal ba bye ba brgya ru yang //
T02D2499:269b-11: lha rnams kun gyis srung du gsol //
T02D2499:269b-12: zhes pa brtan par byed pa'o zhes pa dgu la lag pa 'dzin pa'i bya ba'o /
T02D2499:269b-14: // / rab gnas byas pa'i lha rnams ni //

T02D2499:269b-16: brtag pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa yi //

T02D2499:269b-18: 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa //

T02D2499:269b-20: sbyin sreg de nyid rnam par gnas //
T02D2499:269b-21: sbyin sreg gis ni lha rnams tshim //

T02D2499:269b-23: las rnams kun gyi dngos grub ni //
T02D2499:269b-25: gsang sngags thams cad rab sgrub phyir //
T02D2499:269b-26: sbyin sreg las ni brtsam par bya //
T02D2499:269b-27: me yi gnas ni rnam shes nas //
T02D2499:269b-28: sbyin sreg rab tu brtag bar bya //
T02D2499:269b-29: de yi 'du byed ma bskyed na //
T02D2499:269b-31: zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug / dbye dang bskrad pa la sogs la //

T02D2499:269b-45: mar gyis phun sum tshogs kun byed //

T02D2499:270a-3: sran mas stobs ni chen por byed //

T02D2499:270a-6: gro yis nad ni nyams par byed //

T02D2499:270a-8: zho zan bde ba kun sbyin byed //

T02D2499:270a-24: rgyud kyi dngos sogs yang dag 'dod //
T02D2499:270a-25: sreg blugs thams cad zhal la bsam //

T02D2499:270a-28: bdug spos thams cad 'bar ba la //

T02D2499:270a-30: thugs kar dri la sogs pa kun //

T02D2499:270a-34: rgyan la sogs pa sku la'o //
T02D2499:270a-35: mar me mchod yon zhal zas kyi //
T02D2499:270a-36: mchod pa rim bzhin mdun du dbul //
T02D2499:270a-37: zhes pa sbyin sreg gi man ngag go //
T02D2499:270a-38: chos kyi yi ge las byung shin tu zlum pa'i thab dbus su //
T02D2499:270a-39: re pha las byung gtsug phud gsum pa aom yig chu skyes gnas //
T02D2499:270a-40: 'bar ba'i nang du chu yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shin tu dkar //

T02D2499:270b-0: g-yas kyi @270b phyag gnyis mi 'jigs pa dang phreng bas yongs su brgyan //

T02D2499:270b-6: yungs kar tsandan me tog dang ni ku sha'i rtse dang d'u rba'o //
T02D2499:270b-7: kha shar du lta ba dang nye bar spyod pa
T02D2499:270b-8: thams cad dkar bo dang thab zlum po'o zhes pa

T02D2499:270b-11: // /'bar ba'i nang dus yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i //
T02D2499:270b-12: dbang chen zhes bya'i me ni shin tu ser ba nyid //
T02D2499:270b-13: gos dang rgyan ni kha dog ser po yang dag 'dzin //
T02D2499:270b-14: dbyu gu bgrang phreng spyi blugs mchog sbyin spyan gsum pa //
T02D2499:270b-15: phun tshogs mchog dang nad med shin tu rgyas byed pa //
T02D2499:270b-16: dpal ldan lus chen ral ba bzang po rab tu bcings //
T02D2499:270b-17: lus ni dag byed mchod phyir thogs dang ldan gyur cing //
T02D2499:270b-18: sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems ldan bzhin rgyas pa'o //

T02D2499:270b-21: tshong pa'i me dang dge 'dun tshong bang chen po'i me //
T02D2499:270b-22: ba ta tsamba ka sogs ya dzny'am ga sa m'i //
T02D2499:270b-23: pa rka ti dang ko la aa mra ba'i la 'bras t'a la skyes //
T02D2499:270b-24: gser 'od dz'a me tog brgya pa karni ka /
T02D2499:270b-25: zho zan bur ma dbu pa nas zan til 'khur
T02D2499:270b-26: khanda rnams // thab khung gru bzhi dang kha byang du bya ba dang /
T02D2499:270b-27: nye bar spyod pa rnams kyang ser po'o zhes pa rgyas pa'i me'i las so /
T02D2499:270b-29: // /'bar ba'i shing rta'i dbus su 'dod pa zhes bya'i me rnon po //

T02D2499:270b-35: brtan zhing rol pa'i 'jug pas bde ba kun du myong byed la //
T02D2499:271a-1: skye bo rnams ni cho ga bzhin du dbang byed pa'o //
T02D2499:271a-2: aom k'a m'a gna ye sr'a h'a /
T02D2499:271a-3: tshos byed gar mkhan rje'u rigs smad 'tshong ri mo mkhan gyi me //
T02D2499:271a-4: de bzhin dbang byed las kyi rgyun la legs bsngags yam shing ni //

T02D2499:271a-10: padma autpala dang aa rka aa sho ka dang klu shing ge sar dang //

T02D2499:271a-14: mngar gsum gyis ni byugs pa'i rdzas rnams thams cad do //

T02D2499:271a-16: nub dang rlung du kha phyogs pa dang nyer spyod
T02D2499:271a-17: rnams dmar po'o zhes pa dbang gi me'i las so

T02D2499:271a-21: dud ka khros shing 'jigs rung gzugs //
T02D2499:271a-22: mche ba drag gtsigs sgra ngan can //
T02D2499:271a-23: mdog nag rgyan gyis sku brgyan zhing //
T02D2499:271a-25: skra tshogs dmar ser gyen du brdzes //
T02D2499:271a-26: spyan gsum sdang mig khro gnyer can //
T02D2499:271a-27: g-yas pa ral gri dbyug pa g-yo //
T02D2499:271a-28: g-yon ni zhags pa spyi blugs 'dzin//

T02D2499:271a-30: lhag ma thams cad sngon bzhin no //
T02D2499:271a-31: khar ba lcags rus rdo ba tha ma'i mal //
T02D2499:271a-32: las byung srad bu mdog ngan khyim gyi me //
T02D2499:271a-33: phag gi khyim dang bha danti dang ta ram ga
T02D2499:271a-34: / ganda ka dang ring po mgrin rus ga landa
T02D2499:271a-35: // ko ta ra dang tsher ma can dang tikta shing //

T02D2499:271a-39: yas rnams // thab ni zur gsum pa'am zla ba phyed pa lta bu'o //
T02D2499:271a-40: aom kro dh'agna ye dza hi tro ta ya h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2499:271b-0: nye @271b bar spyod pa thams cad nag po'i zhes pa mngon spyod kyi me'i las so /

T02D2499:274b-20: sbyin pa byed pa'i skye bo la'ang //
T02D2499:274b-21: dus kun zhi dang bde legs mdzod //
T02D2499:274b-23: khyad par ngag kyang gdab bya zhing //
T02D2499:274b-24: dge 'dun tshogs kun mchod ston gyis //
T02D2499:274b-25: spro bar byas te gshegs su gsol //
T02D2499:274b-26: bya ba bcu ni yang dag bsdus pa rab bsgrubs pa'i //
T02D2499:274b-27: dge ba rnam dag ye shes bcu yis sbyangs pa las //
T02D2499:274b-28: skye dgu'i yid kyi ma rig mun pa mthar byes te //
T02D2499:274b-29: myur du pha rol phyin mchog sa ni rab bgrod shog //
T02D2499:274b-30: me'i bya ba bcu pa'o zhes pa dbyig gi phreng
T02D2499:274b-31: ba zhes bya ba cho ga'i bya ba bcu pa
T02D2499:274b-34: / gzhung 'di lha dang bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'dren pa
T02D2499:274b-35: dam pa chos kyi rje sprul sku rin po che'i
T02D2499:274b-36: zhal snga nas kyi bka' lung bzhin /
T02D2499:274b-37: lo ts'a ba dge slong chos skyong bzang pos sa
T02D2499:274b-38: skyong ba mkhyen pa'i spyan ldan dbon chen kun dga'
T02D2499:274b-39: bsod nams rin chen dbang gi rgyal po'i bdag rkyen
